body:
So I've decided to start recording again and the screen recorder I currently have is complete shit, so I was wondering if you have any recommendations???

P.S, Not looking for a screen recorder I have to pay for :/
body_tagged:
So I've decided to start recording again and the screen recorder I currently have is complete shit, so I was wondering if you have any recommendations???

P.S, Not looking for a screen recorder I have to pay for :/
title: Looking For A New Recording SoftWare

replies.body: Well Camtasia has a 30 day trial which I find eay to use. You might want to try that out :P
replies.body_tagged: Well Camtasia has a 30 day trial which I find eay to use. You might want to try that out :P

replies.body: If you don't mind a watermark in every video you could use Bandicam, fairly certain it's free.
replies.body_tagged: If you don't mind a watermark in every video you could use Bandicam, fairly certain it's free.

replies.body: I would recommend Action, OBS or Action
replies.body_tagged: I would recommend Action, OBS or Action

reply_to.body: I would recommend Action, OBS or Action
reply_to.body_tagged: I would recommend Action, OBS or Action

replies.body: Yes Blaze I know because, If setup correctly it can record in good quality but the downside is that is really storage heavy! So its recommended if you have a lot of room on your PC or Hard Drive.
replies.body_tagged: Yes Blaze I know because, If setup correctly it can record in good quality but the downside is that is really storage heavy! So its recommended if you have a lot of room on your PC or Hard Drive.

replies.body: Bandicam is free but the downside is that you can only record 10 minutes then you must that the recording again to continue.
replies.body_tagged: Bandicam is free but the downside is that you can only record 10 minutes then you must that the recording again to continue.

reply_to.body: If you don't mind a watermark in every video you could use Bandicam, fairly certain it's free.
reply_to.body_tagged: If you don't mind a watermark in every video you could use Bandicam, fairly certain it's free.

replies.body: Doesn't require as much storage as fraps or DxTory...
replies.body_tagged: Doesn't require as much storage as fraps or DxTory...

replies.body: Is OBS storage-heavy, too? I don't have much space left :P
replies.body_tagged: Is OBS storage-heavy, too? I don't have much space left :P

replies.body: When recording try and use a hard drive OR don't use a storage heavy recording software and turn down the settings
replies.body_tagged: When recording try and use a hard drive OR don't use a storage heavy recording software and turn down the settings

replies.body: Action is worth this buy mate. I got it for Christmas haven't uploaded break videos yet but I want too
